label: 廻立殿
対訳語: One of the temporary buildings constructed for the great thanksgiving festival.
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: The emperor bathed and changed there before worshiping at the two main buildings, the Hall of the East (Yuki) and the Hall of the West (Suki). [悠紀　主基]
